item.title: Salesforce Projects Lackluster Sales Growth, Fueling AI Anxiety
item.description: Salesforce Inc. projected lackluster quarterly sales growth, fueling Wall Street’s fears that the software giant is losing out to competition from emerging artificial intelligence companies.

item.title: Salesforce Projects Weak Sales Growth, Fueling AI Anxiety
item.description: Salesforce Inc. projected lackluster quarterly sales growth, suggesting its artificial intelligence product isn’t yet paying off as quickly as hoped amid competition from emerging AI companies.

item.title: Salesforce Projects Weak Sales Growth, Fueling AI Anxiety

item.title: Salesforce’s Struggling Stock Needs Earnings to Show AI Progress

item.title: Salesforce, ServiceNow Are in Talks to Invest in Genesys
item.description: Salesforce Inc. and ServiceNow Inc. are investing about $750 million apiece in Genesys Cloud Services Inc. in a rare instance of enterprise software rivals backing the same company.

item.title: Salesforce, ServiceNow Are in Talks to Invest in Genesys
